definition: lit. to shade in the clouds to offset the moon (idiom); fig. a foil/a contrasting character to a main hero
to bake/to heat by fire/to set off by contrast
surname Yun/abbr. for Yunnan Province 雲南省|云南省[Yun2 nan2 Sheng3]
prop/support (for weight)/rest (e.g. arm rest)/thanks to/to hold in one's hand/to support in one's palm/to give/to base/to commit/to set/torr (unit of pressure)
